name: Mix Pictures
description:
"Mix and guess! photo + photo = word " -this is a new word puzzle quiz in which you need to mix the pictures. This game is suitable for fans of games about the word "4 photos one word", "2 photos one word" or "1 photo 1 word", puzzles, quizzes, puzzles and other games where you need to move your brain!!!

How to play the game "mix and guess! photo + photo = word!":

Play mix and guess is very simple, there are only 2 photos that need to be mixed together and guess the encrypted word. If you can not mix photos and guess the word, then you always have the opportunity to take a hint or ask a friend for advice.

Who's playing?!

This game is created for everyone. It can easily be played, both adults and children, so the game "mix and guess" can be played with the whole family!

Features of the game "mix and guess":

Ability to play offline
3 types of hints
Ability to ask a friend for advice
Beautiful, user-friendly and intuitive interface
A huge number of unique levels that will be constantly added
The game will make you move your brains
You will never lose the results Of your current game as the game is automatically saved and you will be able to continue playing from where you left off
